participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: outgoing and creative, with a passion for capturing moments through photography.
participant_1.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm an elementary school teacher.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: down-to-earth and practical, enjoys sharing insights about technology and sports.
participant_2.background: i'm a male. i have children and dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.
